title: Northern Ireland police release officers’ names in ‘monumental’ breach
description: The leak was especially sensitive in Northern Ireland, the only province nation in the United Kingdom where the terrorist threat is “severe."

title: Biden order will propose new restrictions on China tech investment
description: The new White House ban on China investment is aimed at a handful of critical technologies related to military and internal surveillance capabilities.

title: Deal struck to get Leopard tanks to Ukraine from private Belgian broker
description: The deal appeared to end an embarrassing situation for Belgium, in which a private broker had dozens of battle tanks for sale even as NATO allies struggled to find weapons to aid Ukraine.

title: American nurse and her child kidnapped in Haiti are released safely
description: Alix Dorsainvil, 31, and her child were abducted nearly two weeks ago and have returned home, the nonprofit she works for said Wednesday.

title: Songs of war: The Ukrainian musicians merging art and propaganda
description: Ukrainian musicians are on a mission to put their music on the map, revive the country's folk tradition and keep national spirits high after 18 months of war.

title: Last call for a surfers’ hideaway
description: These Indonesian islands have achieved mythical status among surfers. What happens when tourism goes mainstream?

title: She invited four people over for lunch. A week later, three were dead.
description: Australian police have launched an investigation after three people died and a fourth was left needing a liver transplant after eating death cap mushrooms.

title: Panda skeleton discovered in 2,000-year-old Chinese emperor’s tomb
description: The first full skeleton of a giant panda found in a tomb sheds light on ancient burial rituals and status symbols. There were also remains of a tiger, a yak and a bull.

title: Ignoring red flags, South Korea went ahead with Scout jamboree anyway
description: As far back as 2016, planners for the World Scout Jamboree were warning of the risk of heat waves and typhoons. But documents show preparations were not fully made.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Kyiv accuses Moscow of targeting emergency workers
description: President Volodymyr Zelensky said Russia will “bear maximum responsibility” for the missile strikes this week that killed at least nine, including one rescue worker.

title: Niger is slipping away from the West
description: The junta in Niger is withstanding regional pressure to stand down, while support for their coup carries a distinctly anti-Western sheen.

title: Former Pakistan leader Imran Khan banned from public office for 5 years
description: The election commission’s decision to ban the embattled former prime minister over a graft conviction came ahead of the expected dissolution of Parliament.
